headline: How T. Rowe Price’s New Innovation Leaders ETF (TROW) Is Recasting Its Retirement Investment Story
summary: T. Rowe Price recently launched the T. Rowe Price Innovation Leaders ETF (TNXT) on NASDAQ, an actively managed fund with a 0.49% net expense ratio targeting innovation-focused companies across technology, healthcare, and financials. Alongside this ETF launch, the firm’s U.S. Retirement Market Outlook underscored a push into areas like private markets, artificial intelligence, and personalized advice, highlighting how T. Rowe Price is reshaping its offerings for an evolving retirement...
